name: Codespace Environment
postCreateCommand: echo 'Updating package lists...' && sudo apt update && echo 'Upgrading packages...' && sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt upgrade -y && echo 'Installing xvfb...' && sudo apt install xvfb -y && echo 'Enabling corepack...' && corepack enable && echo 'Installing corepack packages...' && COREPACK_ENABLE_DOWNLOAD_PROMPT=0 corepack install && echo 'Installing patchright dependencies...' && sudo pnpm exec patchright install-deps && echo 'Installing npm packages...' && pnpm install
